prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has a vibrant blue body and striking red fins.
I want a playful, aquatic creature with a unique blend of yellow spots on its belly.
Generate a medium-sized Pokemon with a robust, quadrupedal stance and a fierce-looking crest.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of rivers, with features that reflect its swampy habitat.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon that blends elements of crocodiles and playful water creatures.
Design a Pokemon that exudes confidence with its bright colors and distinct aquatic features.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, showcasing a mix of blue and red hues.

distinctive_features: Thick tail with a pointed end
Sharp teeth visible in the mouth
